definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: feed (NH. BAram. id.; Syr. zon; Sam. zwn, zhn);—

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: Pt. [[סוּסִים מוזנים]] Je 5:8 (Kt; i.e. [[מוּזׇנִים]]; Qr [[מְיֻזׇּנִים]] from [[יזן]] q.v.) well-fed horses, fig. of adulterers; Dl:Pr 73 f. comp. As. zanânu, be full (i.e. of sexual desire).
